amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funds in the Grants to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority account by $125,000,000 and increase funds in the Sepnding Reduction account by $125,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Grants to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority account by $125,000,000 and increase funds in the Sepnding Reduction account by $125,000,000.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Garrett.
